fast3d.simple.shapes

Class Cylinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.simple.shapes.GeometricBodyBuilder
      • fast3d.simple.shapes.Cylinder

  • public class Cylinder
extends GeometricBodyBuilder
    a geometric body builder to create cylinders or general prisms
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double height
      the height of the cone
      boolean onGround
      whether to make the cone stand on the xz-plate (true) or let is center be (0,0,0) (false)
      double radius
      the radius of the ground
      int resolution
      how many vertices are used to approach the circular ground

      sets resolution to 20
